amendment.description: To provide in the calculation of retired pay for members of the Armed Forces that service in excess of 30 years shall not be subject to the maximum limit on the percentage of the retired pay multiplier.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4514 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4514 proposed by Senator Warner.
